items.sentence: I have to figure out what Tom really wants me to do.
You\'re not the only one who\'s not able to do that.
I suspect that Tom doesn\'t have to do that anymore.
Tom must\'ve understood what Mary was talking about.
What did you say to Tom that made him cry like that?
I can\'t believe that Tom made that kind of mistake.
Tom didn\'t think that anybody would recognize Mary.
Tom said that he thought that I should study French.
Tom sat down behind the desk and picked up a pencil.
Everything was fine until Tom set the house on fire.
